memberdef.name: ATTR_VALUE_DESC
memberdef.initializer: if (0 == strAttribName.CompareNoCase(attribname)) \ { \ SValueDescription desc = SOUI::SValueDescription::parseValue(strValue);\ varType=desc.type; varValue=desc.value; \ hRet = S_FALSE; \ } \ else \

detaileddescription.para: Abstraction for an Animation that can be applied to Views, Surfaces, or other objects. See the animation package description file.
